verses.verse: When <WH3588> Israel <WH3478> was a child, <WH5288> then I loved <WH157> him, and called <WH7121> my son <WH1121> out of Egypt. <WH4480> <WH4714>
As they called <WH7121> them, so <WH3651> they went <WH1980> from <WH4480> <WH6440> them: they sacrificed <WH2076> unto Baalim, <WH1168> and burned incense <WH6999> to graven images. <WH6456>
I <WH595> taught Ephraim also to go, <WH8637> <WH669> taking <WH3947> them by <WH5921> their arms; <WH2220> but they knew <WH3045> not <WH3808> that <WH3588> I healed <WH7495> them.

I drew <WH4900> them with cords <WH2256> of a man, <WH120> with bands <WH5688> of love: <WH160> and I was <WH1961> to them as they that take off <WH7311> the yoke <WH5923> on <WH5921> their jaws, <WH3895> and I laid <WH5186> meat <WH398> unto <WH413> them.
He shall not <WH3808> return <WH7725> into <WH413> the land <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714> but the Assyrian <WH804> shall be his king, <WH4428> because <WH3588> they refused <WH3985> to return. <WH7725>
And the sword <WH2719> shall abide <WH2342> on his cities, <WH5892> and shall consume <WH3615> his branches, <WH905> and devour <WH398> them, because of their own counsels. <WH4480> <WH4156>
And my people <WH5971> are bent <WH8511> to backsliding <WH4878> from me: though they called <WH7121> them to <WH413> the most High, <WH5920> none at all <WH3808> <WH3162> would exalt <WH7311> him.

How <WH349> shall I give thee up, <WH5414> Ephraim? <WH669> how shall I deliver <WH4042> thee, Israel? <WH3478> how <WH349> shall I make <WH5414> thee as Admah? <WH126> how shall I set <WH7760> thee as Zeboim? <WH6636> mine heart <WH3820> is turned <WH2015> within <WH5921> me, my repentings <WH5150> are kindled <WH3648> together. <WH3162>

I will not <WH3808> execute <WH6213> the fierceness <WH2740> of mine anger, <WH639> I will not <WH3808> return <WH7725> to destroy <WH7843> Ephraim: <WH669> for <WH3588> I <WH595> am God, <WH410> and not <WH3808> man; <WH376> the Holy One <WH6918> in the midst <WH7130> of thee: and I will not <WH3808> enter <WH935> into the city. <WH5892>

They shall walk <WH1980> after <WH310> the LORD: <WH3068> he shall roar <WH7580> like a lion: <WH738> when <WH3588> he <WH1931> shall roar, <WH7580> then the children <WH1121> shall tremble <WH2729> from the west. <WH4480> <WH3220>

They shall tremble <WH2729> as a bird <WH6833> out of Egypt, <WH4480> <WH4714> and as a dove <WH3123> out of the land <WH4480> <WH776> of Assyria: <WH804> and I will place <WH3427> them in <WH5921> their houses, <WH1004> saith <WH5002> the LORD. <WH3068>

Ephraim <WH669> compasseth me about <WH5437> with lies, <WH3585> and the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478> with deceit: <WH4820> but Judah <WH3063> yet <WH5750> ruleth <WH7300> with <WH5973> God, <WH410> and is faithful <WH539> with <WH5973> the saints. <WH6918>
